text.text:
Secret society style organization, few but very powerful members. perhaps
they have minions not technically evil, more like a group of
anti-heroes/anti-villains sort of agree to disagree a magneto vs xavier
conflict given these artifacts are difficult to obtain, they use them for
the time being to help in gathering the rest. only when theyre all
gathered together will they be destroyed. its also not easy to destroy
them Their objective is collecting all the Elder Artifacts - to prevent
the enemies from getting them while such immense power exists, the
universe will never be free think beyond good and evil Ultimately both
groups have the same goal, to get the artifacts out of the picture, but
the Kinship wants them protected, while the Kindred wants them destroyed.
One group argues its a matter of proper use, while the other believes
they're better off without them existing at all. Perhaps the kinship sees
theres more to them than just being tools that theyre there for a purpose,
to be learned from, which is why they host the convergence
